0.1.name: wordpress/comments-needed
0.1.description:
It’s a WordPress plug-in used to remind one-time visitors, for example, those who come from search engines, to post some comments when leaving, by a pop-up comfirmation dialog.

Features: It reminds one-time visitors to post comments. It dosen’t annoy regular visitors who have posted comments before. Compatible with WordPress 2.9. Compatible with IE, Firefox, Chromium/Chrome, etc.
